title: CHAOS (Constraint-Based Holistic Approach for Optimal Synthesis) Workshop for Water Polo Team Training Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of water sports rules and basic techniques, experience in team strategy formulation
context.additional_context: Blended learning environments using students’ personal devices. Focuses on training design reflecting real-game scenarios and team collaboration skills

learning_goals: Based on game analysis data, learners can identify at least three major weaknesses of a team.
Learners can design personalized training scenarios considering physical, cognitive, and emotional stress factors.
Through collaboration with peers, learners can develop and implement a comprehensive training program that reflects constraints.

resources: Biometric Data Measurement Equipment (e.g., Heart Rate Sensors)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
